title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the expected behavior is for the Team entry to be present in the context menu. However, this is not the case.
OB: When I open the context menu for the .java file and another resource, I do not see the Team entry.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I open the context menu for the .java file and another resource, the Team entry should be present.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the context menu for a .java file and another resource.
2. Verify that the Team entry is not present in the context menu.
